name: react-native-androw
description: Solve shadows in React Native for Android
author: Olof Larsson <olof@folof.se> (http://www.folof.se)

scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --follow-tags
